Name: Rappa
Desc: A peculiar girl who appears in Penacony like a flashbang at the darkest hour of night, identifying herself as a ninja and attributing everything in the world to "ninjutsu."\nUpholding the recitation of ninja mantra, creating Dazzling Ninja Seals, and studying ninja scrolls — That is, the Way of the Ninja involves rap, graffiti, and manga — Through rigorous self-discipline, she roams the stars, upholding justice and righteousness.\nAs a member of the Galaxy Rangers, she relentlessly pursues the villain known as Evil Ninja Osaru, chasing them to the very edge of the Cosmos.

1.Name: Returned Is the Revenant With No Ferry Toll
1.Desc: During the "Sealform" state entered by using Ultimate, DMG dealt by Rappa ignores <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of the targets' DEF. After exiting the "Sealform" state, regenerates <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> Energy.

2.Name: Free Is the Mind Enlightened by Haikus
2.Desc: The Enhanced Basic ATK's first 2 hits have their Toughness Reduction against the one designated enemy increased by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.

3.Name: Many Are the Shrines That Repel No Hell
3.Desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

4.Name: Lost Is the Nindō Devoured by Time
4.Desc: While in the "Sealform" state, increases all allies' SPD by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.

5.Name: Steady Is The Ranger With Unerring Arrows
5.Desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

6.Name: Righteous Is the Wrath That Spares No Evil
6.Desc: When battle starts, Rappa gains <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> point(s) of her Talent's Charge, whose upper limit is <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> point(s). After launching the third hit of "Ningu: Demonbane Petalblade," gains <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> point(s) of Charge.

131701.Name: Ninjutsu: Rise Above Tumbles
131701.Desc: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Rappa's ATK to one designated enemy.

131702.Name: Ninja Strike: Rooted Resolute
131702.Desc: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Rappa's ATK to all enemies.

131703.Name: Nindō Supreme: Aishiteru
131703.Desc: Enters the "Sealform" state, immediately gains 1 <u>extra turn</u>, obtains <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> points of "Chroma Ink," and increases Weakness Break Efficiency by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> and Break Effect by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color>.\nWhile in the "Sealform" state, Basic ATK is enhanced, and Skill and Ultimate cannot be used. After using Enhanced Basic ATK, consumes 1 point of "Chroma Ink." When "Chroma Ink" is depleted, exits the "Sealform" state.

131704.Name: Ninja Tech: Endurance Gauge
131704.Desc: Each time the enemy target is Weakness Broken, Rappa gains 1 point of Charge, up to a max of <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> points of Charge. When Rappa next launches the third hit of "Ningu: Demonbane Petalblade," additionally deals Break DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak></color> of Rappa's Imaginary Break DMG to all enemies. This DMG can ignore Weakness Type to reduce <unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak> Toughness, consuming all Charge. Each point of Charge increases the Break DMG multiplier by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#5[i]%</unbreak></color> and increases the Toughness Reduction that can ignore Weakness Type by <unbreak>#6[i]</unbreak>.\nWhen Breaking Weakness, triggers the Imaginary Weakness Break effect.

131706.Name: Attack
131706.Desc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

131707.Name: Ninja Dash: By Leaps and Bounds
131707.Desc: After using Technique, enters the "Graffiti" state for <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> seconds. While in the "Graffiti" state, moves forward rapidly for a set distance and attacks any enemies touched. During the rapid movement, can block all enemies' attacks. Using an attack in the "Graffiti" state can end the state's duration early. After entering combat via attacking enemies, deals <unbreak>#5[i]</unbreak> Toughness Reduction regardless of Weakness Type and Break DMG equal to <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of Rappa's Imaginary Break DMG to each enemy target, and deals Break DMG equal to <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak> of Rappa's Imaginary Break DMG to adjacent targets. At the same time, this unit regenerates <unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak> Energy.

131708.Name: Ningu: Demonbane Petalblade
131708.Desc: Launches "Ningu: Demonbane Petalblade." The first 2 hits deal Imaginary DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Rappa's ATK to one designated enemy and Imaginary DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of Rappa's ATK to adjacent targets, and the 3rd hit deals Imaginary DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak></color> of Rappa's ATK to all enemies.\nEnhanced Basic ATK will not recover Skill Points. Attacking enemies that don't have Imaginary Weakness can still reduce Toughness, whose effect is equal to <unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak> of the original Toughness Reduction. When Breaking Weakness, triggers the Imaginary Weakness Break effect.

1.PointDesc: When the Weakness of an elite-level or higher enemy is broken, Rappa additionally gains <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> point(s) of Charge and regenerates <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> Energy.

While in the "Sealform" state, after Rappa uses Enhanced Basic ATK to deal DMG to a Weakness Broken enemy target, converts the Toughness Reduction from this instance of DMG to 1 instance of <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> Super Break DMG.

When an enemy target becomes Weakness Broken, increases the Break DMG taken by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>. If Rappa's current ATK is higher than <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak>, for every <unbreak>100</unbreak> excess ATK, additionally increases this value by <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak>, up to a max additional increase of <unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak>. This effect lasts for <unbreak>#5[i]</unbreak> turn(s).
